talents.Name: Commune with divinity
talents.Effect:
When you gain this Talent, select 2 Power Skills from the list below to be your Acolyte Creed. When you use this ability, prepare Powers that draw from these Skills:
- Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nox, Rime, Tempest, Vivus

Use your Composure to connect with a higher power. Gain Hits + Steady Power ranks to prepare your Rites (minimum 1).
You Rites have the following characteristics:
- Threshold: 3
- Backlash: Penance - For each Rite you use that results in Hits greater than Threshold, mark 1 Penance. Penance affects your ability to call upon your higher power, as described by the BAMF when it occurs. Penance can be paid by spending actions outside of combat usuiing Composure, reducing your current Peneance by Hits in the results set.

You can use this ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 5 - Steady Actions (minimum 1 action).

talents.Name: Composure (3)
talents.Effect: Increase your Composure rating to 3 (d10).

talents.Name: Creed (2)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Creed ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Creed (2)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Creed ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Creed (3)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Creed ratings to 3 (d10).

talents.Name: Attune with forces
talents.Effect:
When you gain this Talent, select 2 Power Skills from the list below to be your Adept Foci. When you use this ability, prepare Powers that draw from these Skills:
- Aether, Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nihil, Nox, Rime, Squall, Tellus, Tempest, Torrent, Vivus

Use your Insight to connect with the forces within. Gain Hits + Deft or Uncanny Power ranks to prepare your Powers.
You Powers gain the following characteristics:
- Threshold: 3
- Backlash: Strain -- You gain 1 Strain for every Hit a Power generates above Threshold. If your total Strain exceeds your Grit at any time, you make all rolls at Challenge +2d.

You can use this ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 5 - Uncanny Actions (minimum 1 action).

talents.Name: Insight (3)
talents.Effect: Increase your Insight rating to 3 (d10).

talents.Name: Foci (2)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Foci (2)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Foci (3)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 3 (d10).

talents.Name: Prepare concoctions
talents.Effect: Craft

talents.Name: Sneak Attack
talents.Effect: When you successfully attack a target while Hidden, add +1d6 bonus Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Powerlifter
talents.Effect: Exert yourself to accomplish a feat of strength, adding +1d4 bonus hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Sprinter
talents.Effect: When you Shift to move to an adjacent Zone, you may move an additional Zone.

talents.Name: Brutal Strike
talents.Effect: Strike one target with unrelenting force, adding +1d4 Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Last Stand
talents.Effect: Exert yourself when you are below your maximum Grit.  Regain +Hits to your Primary Defense and reduce the Challenge by 1d.

talents.Name: Exert (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Exert rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Channeling
talents.Effect:
When you gain this Talent, select 2 Power Skills from the list below to be your Channeler Foci. When you use this ability, prepare Powers that draw from these Skills:
- Inferno, Lux, Nox, Rime, Squall, Tellus, Tempest, Torrent

Endure to draw the forces to your will. Gain Hits + Steady ranks to prepare your Techniques.
You Techniques have the following characteristics:
- Threshold: 4
- Backlash: Recoil - If a Power results in Hits less than Threshold, all targets within your Current Zone sustain Hits from the Power's effect equal to the total amount below Threshold.

You can use this ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 3 - Steady Actions (minimum 1 action).

talents.Name: Foci (2)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Foci (2)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Foci (3)
talents.Effect: Increase one of your Foci ratings to 3 (d10).

talents.Name: Defensive Stance
talents.Effect: Focus to defend yourself in combat, adding +Hits to your Primary Defense.

talents.Name: Harm's Way
talents.Effect: Focus to protect an ally in your Zone. Before the beginning of your next turn, you may redirect a number of Hits against that ally to yourself equal to the Hits in your Focus result set.

talents.Name: Indomitable Presence
talents.Effect: Intimidate your opponents, causing them to hesitate. Add +2 to the current Timer.

talents.Name: Focus (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Focus rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Investigate (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Focus rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Browbeat
talents.Effect: Intimidate your target outside of combat, adding +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: It's all a facade
talents.Effect: Deceive opponents in your Current Zone, masking your true intentions.

talents.Name: Persuade (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Persuade rating to 2 (d8)

talents.Name: Deceive (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Deceive rating to 2 (d8)

talents.Name: Unflappable
talents.Effect: When you Recover to regain Nerve, regain and additional +1d4 Bonus Hits.

talents.Name: Persuade (3)
talents.Effect: Increase your Persuade rating to 3 (d10)

talents.Name: Deceive (3)
talents.Effect: Increase your Deceive rating to 3 (d10)

talents.Name: Silver Tongue
talents.Effect: Persuade your target, adding +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Quick Draw
talents.Effect: You can draw or change weapons without using a Shift.

talents.Name: Riposte
talents.Effect: Counterattack an enemy Strike that just scored 0 Hits.  Deal 1d4 bonus Hits.

talents.Name: Embrace the cycle
talents.Effect:
When you gain this Talent, increase you Vivus Skill rating to 2 (d8).
Use your Composure to let the cylce of life and death flow through you. Gain Hits + Steady Power ranks to prepare your Powers.
You Powers gain the following characteristics:
- Threshold: 3
- Backlash:Drain - If a Power results in Hits less than Threshold, you suffer a number of Hits equal to the total amount below Threshold as the cyle extracts its toll on you.

You can use this ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 4 - Savvy Actions (minimum 1 action).

talents.Name: Study the arcane
talents.Effect:
When you gain this Talent, increase you rating in any 2 Power Skills from the list below:
- Aether, Arithm, Inferno, Lux, Mori, Nihil, Nox, Rime, Squall, Tellus, Tempest , Torrent

Research to memorize spells. Gain Hits + Savvy Power ranks to prepare your Powers.
You Powers gain the following characteristics:
- Threshold: 4
- Backlash: Spellburn - If a Power results in Hits greater than Threshold, you suffer a number of Hits equal to the total amount above Threshold. Your target(s) sustain Spellburn Hits as well, in addition to the Power's effect.

You can use this ability without using an Action at the beginning of each Waypoint. If you use it during a Waypoint, it requires 6 - Savvy Actions (minimum 1 action).

talents.Name: Aim
talents.Effect: Use a Shift to aim carefully, then immediately Shoot your target at -1d Challenge.  Add +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set (bonus Hits do not count 1s against Initiative).

talents.Name: Controlled Pair
talents.Effect: When you Shoot a target with no 1s in the result set, you may immediately make a second Shoot attempt.

talents.Name: Double Tap
talents.Effect: Shoot your target at +2d Challenge.

talents.Name: Shoot (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Shoot rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Shoot (3)
talents.Effect: Increase your Shoot rating to 3 (d10).

talents.Name: Shooter
talents.Effect: When you Shoot your target but earn 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Float like a butterfly. . .
talents.Effect: Until the beginning of your next turn, use Reflexes +1d4 as as your Primary Defense.

talents.Name: Living Weapon
talents.Effect: When you use your Martial Arts against your target but earn 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: First Aid
talents.Effect: Administer basic care to an injury.

talents.Name: Coordinated Assault
talents.Effect: Lead your Minions to launch a coordinated attack against a single target, dealing Hits +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Invoke the divine
talents.Effect: Composure

talents.Name: Derive axioms
talents.Effect: Analyze

talents.Name: Hone the mind
talents.Effect: Focus

talents.Name: Shoot (3)
talents.Effect: Increase your Shoot rating to 3 (d10).

talents.Name: Skirmisher
talents.Effect: When you Shift to move within your current Zone and attack a target, you may spend 1 Hit to Shift again this turn.

talents.Name: Skirmisher
talents.Effect: When you Shift to move within your current Zone and attack a target, you may spend 1 Hit to Shift again this turn.

talents.Name: Knowledge is Power
talents.Effect: Research to gain critical information about the current situation.  Increase the current Timer by Hits - 2 and decrease the Challenge by -1d.

talents.Name: Linguistic Aptitude
talents.Effect: Use Linguistics to speak or decipher any language.  Create +Hits Advantages you can spend on Persuade or Invesitgate.

talents.Name: Analytical Mind
talents.Effect: Analyze your surroundings, gaining insights into potential weaknesses or hidden detail.  Create Hits +2 Advantages in your current Zone.  Allies can use these Advantages if you are able to communicate with them.

talents.Name: Forked Tongue
talents.Effect: Deceive your target, adding +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: It's all a facade
talents.Effect: Deceive opponents in your Current Zone, masking your true intentions.

talents.Name: Cleave
talents.Effect: When you Strike your target to death, apply Hits -2 to another target in your current Zone.

talents.Name: Fighter
talents.Effect: When you Strike your target but earn 0 Hits, add +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Float like a butterfly. . .
talents.Effect: Until the beginning of your next turn, use Reflexes +1d4 as as your Primary Defense.

talents.Name: Peer through depths
talents.Effect: Perceive

talents.Name: Commune with spirits
talents.Effect: Persuade the spirits within.  Gain Hits + Savvy Power ranks.

talents.Name: Overwatch
talents.Effect: When one or more hostile targets moves into your current Zone, you may deal 1d4 bonus Hits to one of them.

talents.Name: Zero in
talents.Effect: When you Aim, add +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Aim
talents.Effect: Use a Shift to aim carefully, then immediately Shoot your target at -1d Challenge.  Add +1d4 bonus Hits to the result set (bonus Hits do not count 1s against Initiative).

talents.Name: Charge
talents.Effect: Use a Shift to move into an adjacent Zone, then immediately Strike your target, adding +2 Hits to the result set.

talents.Name: Quick Draw
talents.Effect: You can draw or change weapons without using a Shift.

talents.Name: Combat Training
talents.Effect: You may Strike or Shoot at a target and use a Shift to use a non-combat skill.  Roll +2d Challenge.  Divide the Hits between the the two skills.

talents.Name: It's all a facade
talents.Effect: Deceive opponents in your Current Zone, masking your true intentions.

talents.Name: Master Eavesdropp
talents.Effect: Perceive a private conversation while Hidden to gather information.  Ignore 1s in the result set.

talents.Name: Quick Draw
talents.Effect: You can draw or change weapons without using a Shift.

talents.Name: Fall Back
talents.Effect: Lead allies in your current and all adjacent Zones in a tactical retreat, allowing a number of allies equal to Hits in the result set to immediately Shift away from hostile targets without risk.

talents.Name: Inspire Allies
talents.Effect: Lead all allies in your current Zone, allowing a number of them equal to the Hits in the result set to choose 1 of the following: Recover, Take -1d to their next Action, add 1 Hit to their next result set

talents.Name: Reposition
talents.Effect: Lead allies in your current Zones, allowing a number of them equal to the Hits in the result set to immediately use a Shift.

talents.Name: Exert (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Exert rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Endure (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Endure rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Endure (3)
talents.Effect: Increase your Endure rating to 3 (d10).

talents.Name: Hard to Kill
talents.Effect: Increase your Grit by 3.

talents.Name: I can take it
talents.Effect: When you take more than 1 Hit from an effect, reduce the total Hits by 1.

talents.Name: Shake it off
talents.Effect: Use a Shift to Recover.

talents.Name: Taunt
talents.Effect: Intimidate all hostile targets in your current Zone, +nd Challenge.  Until the beginning of your next turn, a number of hostiles equal to the Hits in your result set target only you.

talents.Name: Walk it off
talents.Effect: When you Recover, regain +2 Defenses.

talents.Name: Implements (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Implements rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Legerdemain (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Legerdemain rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Stealth (2)
talents.Effect: Increase your Stealth rating to 2 (d8).

talents.Name: Suplex
talents.Effect: Grapple your target, adding +1d4 bonus Hits and making them Prone.
